EmailTemplate.textOnly: - - - - 98 Clean false false false false EN-US X-NONE X-NONE Hi Antonio, I’m reaching out with a special offer for educational organizations as we approach the summer months. I’ve worked with a number of EDU’s including Boston College <[[http://mkto-sjp0104.com/ol/jEtVdMfII1xQsRpg5uiMMKvivTDUe5u9qKgwWbq2n59ziQVuYOPLdRGphcBWFZZvNa%2DaCAZNQsIylEpLFL3FOoVJ%5FqhZG06lWTfmi4HfYI4AYqF9xY9k%2D73jzWkB943El0TYG05TbUVFMAC1R6YZ1jHsAKQKDS6d1CPDAqEzng8Ejo0w%5FJmRSpbh1UeJpGjy3WGjLlZpyuWu8GWlXM1Er%5FYYk3UO4H10WLXM7hiU7IgDpQsIpfVZhzF18NtIOcs6sEqIDAKz5ajgQ9JZFqCwnbvrha8hfy8fudQtdkTHK1bqG4uvVDdIo0qYkB0WYAJjKWlsIdk3qx3cqHkIJvs3XwK%5FmRENzm1y471d%2Db%5FzmAjIZULnCTmj51bt/j0xQc83KI1lNoVdlsbPWNrz%5FnTrOdZWhuPJ%2DBvqpxd9z2kdwZunBLA76mN9eHZYhKt2LEwAfHZ9syQ8VOO%2DGaI9O2fpRB0S1XXbMlaLZap5dPIdn09N4sbih3j8Iocm9hlPHVB0WdVBHXgy%2Db%2D8GszLsCsZ7SQbS0C3DINcQnh4MrJUJwICjcorhqV613nLz%5FyynAXZU5c2u7RnvKNw5vw%2C%2C]]>, Northeastern University <[[http://mkto-sjp0104.com/ol/jEtVdMfII1xQsRpg5uiMMKvivTDUe5u9qKgwWbq2n59ziQVuYOPLdRGphcBWFZZvNa%2DaCAZNQsIylEpLFL3FOoVJ%5FqhZG06lWTfmi4HfYI4AYqF9xY9k%2D73jzWkB943El0TYG05TbUVFMAC1R6YZ1jHsAKQKDS6d1CPDAqEzng8Ejo0w%5FJmRSpbh1UeJpGjy3WGjLlZpyuWu8GWlXM1Er%5FYYk3UO4H10WLXM7hiU7IgDpQsIpfVZhzF18NtIOcs6sEqIDAKz5ajgQ9JZFqCwnbvrha8hfy8fudQtdkTHK1bqG4uvVDdIo0qYkB0WYAJjKWlsIdk3qx3cqHkIJvs3XwK%5FmRENzm1y471d%2Db%5FzmAjIZULnCTmj51bt/j0tVccfJKVlNoVdlsbPWNb760SHFeZC%2DurB0Dfby14E91kUxYv7APFTsnJ5DGYE3ZPudCU0EBoJjzwJXF%2DmWM4NB6fAQGFWnXDL6k%2D6MTakDUucqkeI5qPeo03Q6vtKJzw7UPG4lentPYla7XrArvmu%5FJpV2dVWF7yvyN7EntQAFk68M2av%2DL56h0EWV5l3v2RKnNV1I44TIzhnvKA%2C%2C]]>, Princeton University <[[http://mkto-sjp0104.com/ol/jEtVdMfII1xQsRpg5uiMMKvivTDUe5u9qKgwWbq2n59ziQVuYOPLdRGphcBWFZZvNa%2DaCAZNQsIylEpLFL3FOoVJ%5FqhZG06lWTfmi4HfYI4AYqF9xY9k%2D73jzWkB943El0TYG05TbUVFMAC1R6YZ1jHsAKQKDS6d1CPDAqEzng8Ejo0w%5FJmRSpbh1UeJpGjy3WGjLlZpyuWu8GWlXM1Er%5FYYk3UO4H10WLXM7hiU7IgDpQsIpfVZhzF18NtIOcs6sEqIDAKz5ajgQ9JZFqCwnbvrha8hfy8fudQtdkTHK1bqG4uvVDdIo0qYkB0WYAJjKWlsIdk3qx3cqHkIJvs3XwK%5FmRENzm1y471d%2Db%5FzmAjIZULnCTmj51bt/j0tVc8fJL1lNoVdlsbPWNb760SHFeZC%2DurB0Dfby14E91kUxYv7APFTsnJ5DGYE3ZPudCU0EBoJjzwJXF%2DmWM4NB6fAQGFWnXDL6k%2D6DSd0DUpVQkeM23feo03Q6vtKJzw7UPG4lentPYla7XrArvmu%5FJpV2dVWF7yvyN7EntQAFk68M2av%2DL56h0EWV5l3v2RKnNV1I44TIzhnvKA%2C%2C]]>, Penn State etc. to alleviate their IT management challenges. They generally run within a July-June budget cycle and occasionally have remaining funds towards the end of their fiscal year. I typically find these customers bear one of two prevalent problems: - Their IT environments are highly fragmented, marked by high inefficiency and/or - Their staff is limited, thinly spread and under-resourced. Turbonomic directly addresses both of these challenges. With that in mind, we’d like to offer a $15,000 discount for any deal with us, if you install Turbonomic’s autonomic performance platform before mid-June. You can find the free 30-day trial here <[[http://mkto-sjp0104.com/ol/jEtVdMfII1xQsRpg5uiMMKvivTDUe5u9qKgwWbq2n59ziQVuYOPLdRGphcBWFZZvNa%2DaCAZNQsIylEpLFL3FOoVJ%5FqhZG06lWTfmi4HfYI4AYqF9xY9k%2D73jzWkB943El0TYG05TbUVFMAC1R6YZ1jHsAKQKDS6d1CPDAqEzng8Ejo0w%5FJmRSpbh1UeJpGjy3WGjLlZpyuWu8GWlXM1Er%5FYYk3UO4H10WLXM7hiU7IgDpQsIpfVZhzF18NtIOcs6sEqIDAKz5ajgQ9JZFqCwnbvrha8hfy8fudQtdkTHK1bqG4uvVDdIo0qYkB0WYAJjKWlsIdk3qx3cqHkIJvs3XwK%5FmRENzm1y471d%2Db%5FzmAjIZULnCTmj51bt/j09SdcTPLllNoVdlsbPWJbvomjvDc4qrt7kzH%5Fryx9081gZ9feGAPVn7jcFfHZ5%5FaeCQCkwaAIBgnxlKFr2daJRQ6bAOKgTgfn6tprXPfY9Bf7t%2D1cIv%5FKeonTIjrtKVnFDDCEsdBSNKcBOPa7AuizDuM91wD06D%2D2KMIZUqnSRN15tC25m%5FQqe78C7y7XHnxw%2DEF1ctwvaU4WbqVI9vzv1XvVR021IQecne7iPVyrMc%5FHQW4MdBuA9238lVCchk1RTMDQCmt6s%2C]]> or by visiting turbonomic.com/downloads/turbonomic-30-day-trial/. I hope to connect in the coming weeks to discuss Turbo and the different use cases that EDU customers have seen an immediate ROI. Best,Katie Katie NorchiSales Development RepresentativeO: 857.305.4618 C: 440.708.8477500 Boylston Street, Boston, MA 02116
